participant_1.background:
My most valuable thing is my collection of Celtics memorabilia.
I do laundry once a week to keep my home clean and tidy.
i do not have a good social life.
i have a pug named corky.
i have made over 90 , 000 on trifecta bets alone this year.

participant_2.background:
My weight is average, but I am trying to lose a few pounds.
i don t like feeling obligated to hang out with someone.
i am in a very intimate and loving relationship.
I have to work hard to keep up with my family.
the idea of working is not my cup of tea.

content.text: Hi there, what's your name?
Hello, my name is [name]. What about you?
Hello [name], I'm [name]. It's nice to meet you!
Nice to meet you too! What do you do for fun?
I like to play video games, watch movies, and spend time with my dog.
Oh, that sounds fun! I like to do those things too. I also like to read and go for walks.
I love to read too! What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read all kinds of books, but I really enjoy historical fiction and mystery novels.
Oh, that's great! I love historical fiction too. I'm currently reading a book about the Civil War.
That sounds really interesting! I've never read a book about the Civil War before.
It is really interesting! I'm learning a lot about the history of our country.
That's great! I'm always looking for new ways to learn.
Me too! What do you do for work?
I'm a stay-at-home mom, but I'm also a writer.
Oh, that's awesome! What kind of things do you write?
I write mostly short stories and articles. I'm working on a novel right now, but it's not finished yet.
That's really cool! I've always wanted to write a novel.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
I think I might just do that!
That's great! I would love to read it when you're finished.
I'll be sure to let you know!
Thank you
